EmailTemplate.name: EOI/CA Automatically Cancellation Notification To Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: EOI/CA for {projectName} has been cancelled automatically
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {customerName},
Your {EOI/CA} for {projectName} has been cancelled automatically as it failed to meet the business requirements set by Dynamix Group.
In case of any queries or assistance required, please contact us on {projectNumber}.
Regards, Dynamix Group
